name: Ranger Dobson

topics.response_text: No time to talk now. I have to get ready to return to base with this information. I'll get a fat raise for this, if anyone actually believes me.
Ha! Just having some fun with you, waster. No harm done, right? What can I do for you?
Exactly what powder ganger scum would say! Any last words before I pull this trigger?
Relax, son. Just pulling your leg. What can I do for you?

topics.topic_text: Keep pointing that gun at me and I'll stick it up your ass.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Ha! Got some stones on you, son. I like that. What can I do for you?
Hey, what are you doing to my radio?

topics.topic_text: So no one knows you're here?
topics.response_text: Standard practice. Rangers operate on our own most of the time. And that's how we like it.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: You're a strange one, aren'tcha? Fine, what did you want to talk about?
Criminal scum that've infested this region, attacking caravans and regular folk just passing through.

topics.topic_text: The Brotherhood of Steel has a base inside one of the bunkers here. They sent me after you.
topics.response_text: {Disbelief, thinks player's crazy}A Brotherhood base? Here? Are you shitting me? No one's seen them for years.

topics.topic_text: How about this explosive collar around my neck?
topics.response_text: I'll be. Let me take a look at that.

topics.topic_text: I was just trying to fix it.
topics.response_text: I've been trying to get that damn thing working for days, and you decided to just start tinkering with it? Let me see that.
Okay, but if I find you messing with it again, there'll be hell to pay, you hear me?

topics.topic_text: Actually, I rigged your radio with a bomb.
topics.response_text: Well, at least you're man enough to admit it. Now get the hell out of here. If I see you again, it'll be through my rifle's sight.

topics.topic_text: This seems like a bad location for a safehouse.
topics.response_text: Oh? And in your expert opinion, why would that be?

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Powder gangers use these bunkers as hideouts once or twice a month.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You've seen that with your own two eyes?
I see. Well, I'll take that under advisement.

topics.topic_text: You have to get out of here.
topics.response_text: Now why would I do that? You see some powder gangers on the approach or something?
Well, I was thinking I might set this bunker up as a safehouse. Between the remote location and the dust storms, I figured it was ideal.
Dobson's my name. I'm an NCR Ranger, operating out of Camp McCarran north of here. Redding man by birth, though.
The desert can play tricks on a man's mind. Don't let it bother you overmuch.
What? Let me see that.

conversation.response_text: You did{stressed}not just destroy my radio.
You mess with a man's radio, and he might take it personal like, you hear?

description:
Ranger Dobson is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

A seasoned NCR Ranger from Redding, currently operating independently in the Mojave Wasteland. Dobson is conducting off-the-books reconnaissance on the NCR Correctional Facility and its Powder Ganger occupants, using a pre-War military bunker in Hidden Valley as his safehouse.

Ranger Dobson's Personality: Confident and proud of his role as a protector of the innocent, but cautious and aware of his limits as a seasoned Ranger. He values the NCR's mission but isn't afraid to operate independently when necessary.

Ranger Dobson's Backstory: Born and raised in Redding, Dobson joined the New California Republic Rangers in his early twenties. By 2281, he was deployed to the Mojave and stationed at Camp McCarran. In early October 2281, he went off on his own to scout the NCR Correctional Facility, which had been overrun by Powder Gangers. He established a hidden camp in one of the pre-War military bunkers scattered around Hidden Valley, utilizing the remote location and frequent sandstorms to maintain a low profile while conducting his reconnaissance.
